James Nash
==========

Posted on
[January 22, 2024](https://glotwp.com/employee/james-nash/ "James Nash")
by
webdevral

Jim Nash has been a Gloucester Township. Resident since 1984. Married to Colleen, they are the proud parents of two, Jimmy and Dylan. Jim spent his entire educational career here in Gloucester Township. Starting at Erial Elementary, JW Lilley Elementary, Blackwood Elementary, Charles W. Lewis Middle School, Highland Regional High School and finishing at Camden County College as a Business Administration Major.

Jim worked in the software industry for a Fortune 5000 company for 14 years. His career path led him to leaving that industry and joining his family owned and operated business, ran locally out of Deptford.

Jim is extremely active in our community. He is actively serving as the President of Gloucester Township Baseball and Flag Football and has been for the past 6 years. Prior to that he was the League Commissioner for 4 years. He also coached boys basketball for GTBBL and girls Basketball and girls Softball for GTGAA. In his free time he is an avid Astronomer and Astrophotographer and is an active member of the South Jersey Astronomy Club.

‹
[Carolyn Grace](https://glotwp.com/employee/carolyn-grace/)

[Michael Mignone](https://glotwp.com/employee/michael-mignone/)
